text: Francisco Waldir Pires de Souza (21 October 1926 – 22 June 2018) was a Brazilian politician. He served as Minister of Defence under President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva,List of Historical Brazilian Minister of Defence from the official Defence Ministry Website (in Portuguese) before being fired in 2007.Brazil's defence minister fired, BBC News, 25 July 2007. From 1987 to 1989, he served as Governor of Bahia. He was born in Acajutiba, Brazil. Pires died on 22 June 2018 in Rio de Janeiro of multiple organ failure at the age of 91.Waldir Pires morre aos 91 anos ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Bahia
